### [Initializing a user defaults controller](/documentation/AppKit/NSUserDefaultsController/init(coder:)#Initializing-a-user-defaults-controller)

[`init(defaults: UserDefaults?, initialValues: [String : Any]?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsuserdefaultscontroller/init(defaults:initialvalues:))Returns an initialized NSUserDefaultsController object using the NSUserDefaults instance specified in `defaults` and the initial default values contained in the `initialValues` dictionary.
